name: Conversions on single page domain by sessions
description: In a single domain website, most of the sessions shall be aligned to only one hostname. This hostname should have not only most of the sessions but also most of the conversions.

constants.name: sessionThreshold
constants.description: share of transactions on the main domain should be above this threshold

constants.name: nrHostnamesDisplayed
constants.description: maximum number of largest hostnames displayed in case of failure

blocks.description: It checks presence of transaction data
Evaluates the total of the transactions and reports about the amount of sessions transactions by each hostname to see the hostname detaining the most transactions among your websites.
blocks.passMessage: Ratio of transactions on the most visited hostname  (${hostName}) to all transactions is higher than ${transactionThreshold*100} %
blocks.failMessage: Ratio of transactions on the most visited hostname  (${hostName}) to all transactions is not higher than ${transactionThreshold*100} %
blocks.failHowtofix: Check if there is some filter for inclusion of hostnames applied, if not, create one. It should be include filter with defined main hostname.
